'''"Night Pilot's Watchtower"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Night Pilot's Watchtower" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
